description: This Python source file defines an AI assistant for the Agno framework, including class definitions for agents, tools, and a playground setup. It contains code to initialize knowledge bases, create agents with specific tools and models, and configure a web app for interaction.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific tools, models, and configurations for interacting with users.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Handles knowledge base loading from URLs with vector database support.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A vector database implementation used for knowledge search.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: Creates a web interface for interacting with multiple agents.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Manages persistent storage of session data in an SQLite database.

classes.name: DalleTools
classes.description: Provides tools for generating images with DALL-E 3.

classes.name: ElevenLabsTools
classes.description: Provides tools for text-to-speech audio generation.

classes.name: PythonTools
classes.description: Provides tools for executing Python code within the agent environment.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Returns the web application object for the playground.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the web server for the playground app.
